paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted three novel variants in the KCNH2 gene associated with Long QT Syndrome, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

functional_data.summary: KCNH2 mutations L413P and L559H are associated with bifid T waves on ECGs.

variants.additional_notes: The study identified three novel mutations in KCNH2.
key_quotes: The KCNH2 mutations include L413P in transmembrane domain S1, E444D in the extracellular loop between S1 and S2, and L559H in domain S5.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
